CommandPing.label: Ping Command
CommandPing.tooltip: The command that will be responded to.

CommandPingCooldown.label: Ping Command Cooldown (seconds)
CommandPingCooldown.tooltip: How long the Ping command should go on cooldown for.

PermissionOnPing.label: Permission
PermissionOnPing.tooltip: Who is able to use the script commands.

PermissionInfoOnPing.label: Info
PermissionInfoOnPing.tooltip: This field should only be filled when using the user_specific permission.

PermissionDeniedMessage.value: Permission denied: You have to be a {0} to use {1} command!
PermissionDeniedMessage.label: Permission Denied Message
PermissionDeniedMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent on failed permission check. 0 — required permission, 1 — command.

ResponseMessage.label: Command
ResponseMessage.tooltip: The message that will be sent to chat when using the command.

InvalidCommandCallMessage.label: Invalid Command Call Message
InvalidCommandCallMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent if user calls a command with invalid parameters. 0 — command, 1 — command usage example.

TimeRemainingMessage.value: Command {0} is on cooldown. Time remaining: {1} (seconds).
TimeRemainingMessage.label: Time Remaining Message
TimeRemainingMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent if user tries to call command which is on cooldown now. 0 — command which is on cooldown, 1 — time remaining.

OptionValueTheSameMessage.value: {0}, option {1} value cannot be changed to the same value {2}
OptionValueTheSameMessage.label: On Changing Option Value To The Same Message
OptionValueTheSameMessage.tooltip: The message that will be sent to chat when user tries to change option value to the same value. 0 — user name, 1 — option name, 2 — current option value.

OptionValueChangedMessage.value: {0}, option {1} value has been changed from {2} to {3}
OptionValueChangedMessage.label: On Changing Option Value To New Value Message
OptionValueChangedMessage.tooltip: The message that will be sent to chat when user changes settings option. 0 — user name, 1 — option name, 2 — old option value, 3 — new option value.

FailedToSetOptionMessage.label: On Failed To Change Option Value Message
FailedToSetOptionMessage.tooltip: The message that will be sent to chat when settings option cannot be changed. 0 — user name, 1 — option name, 2 — error description.

FailedToSetOptionInvalidTypeMessage.label: On Failed To Change Option Due To Invalid Type Message
FailedToSetOptionInvalidTypeMessage.tooltip: The message that will be sent to chat when settings option cannot be changed due to invalid type. 0 — expected type.

FailedToSetOptionInvalidNameMessage.label: On Failed To Change Option Due To Invalid Name Message
FailedToSetOptionInvalidNameMessage.tooltip: The message that will be sent to chat when settings option cannot be changed due to invalid name.

AllowLoggingToFile.label: Allow Logging To File
AllowLoggingToFile.tooltip: Allow script to log to file in script folder.
